articles.title: Party and State Commendations Awarded to Contributors to H-bomb Test
articles.content:
Party and State Commendations Awarded to Contributors to H-bomb Test
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of awarding party and state commendations to nuclear scientists, technicians, soldier-builders, workers and officials who contributed to demonstrating the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea through Juche Korea's first successful H-bomb test took place with splendor at the meeting hall of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on Jan. 12.
					 Present there was supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Prior to the ceremony, he made a congratulatory speech.
					
					 He said that the recent event instilled strength incomparable to the mysterious force of the vast space into the army and people of the DPRK, demonstrated the invincibility and mightiness of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea far and wide and struck terrible horror into the hearts of the U.S. imperialists and their followers.
					
					 Thanks to a lot of sweat shed by you while conducting painstaking inquiry and showing patriotic loyalty, the DPRK, single-mindedly united  politico-ideological power and world famous military power, proudly joined the advanced nuclear weapons states, he noted, and continued:
					
					 Gone forever are the times when the U.S. imperialists could threaten and blackmail the DPRK with nuclear weapons while regarding them as its monopoly and now it has become the greatest threat to the U.S.
					
					 Your heroic achievements and feats will shine forever along with the Juche-oriented socialist country and the WPK's history.
					
					 I am convinced that there will be only a glorious long journey in the future, too, before the Juche revolution to be made by us together with our dependable nuclear scientists, technicians, soldier-builders, workers and officials.
					
					 We should never allow the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the enemies, he said, adding that the outrageous, illegal and wicked U.S. imperialists and their followers are working hard with blood-shot eyes to bring down our social system from all sides through harsh economic blockade and military pressure but we should make them clearly know the status of our strongest nuclear weapons state by making such  a bold  head-on charge as countering the enemy's  dagger attack with a sword and retaliating against a rifle attack with an artillery piece just as we did in the grim years of the revolution.
					
					 He underlined the need for the participants to bear deep in mind the pride and self-respect today, turn out as one in the campaign of brains and ability to bolster up both in quality and quantity the nuclear force, the greatest patriotic legacy of the great leaders, and thus thoroughly implement the WPK's idea and line on building the nuclear force.
					
					 The WPK highly appreciates once again the feats of all the participants who brought about a great event to be specially recorded in the history of the nation spanning 5 000 years, he said, hoping that the scientists standing guard over the nation's nuclear arsenal would register bigger successes in the efforts to make a triumphant advance of the cause of the Juche revolution.
					
					 Then a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was read out.
					
					 Kim Jong Un personally awarded party and state commendations to the nuclear scientists, technicians, soldier-builders, workers and officials who contributed to the successful H-bomb test of Juche Korea.
					
					 Seeing H-bomb developers full of conviction, I feel as if I gained everything, he noted, calling on the dependable nuclear combatants of the WPK to powerfully demonstrate the might of the nuclear power of Juche, Songun Korea before the whole world through the detonation of more powerful H-bomb in the future on the basis of the achievements and experience gained by them.
					
					 He emphasized that the WPK laid down the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force in order to honorably protect the country from the ever-increasing nuclear threat and blackmail and military pressure of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Pointing out that the U.S. imperialists and their followers are now bringing dark clouds of a nuclear war, rendering the situation on the Korean Peninsula extremely tense through sanctions and introduction of strategic weapons into south Korea, he called for bolstering up both in quality and quantity the nuclear force capable of making nuclear strikes at the U.S.-led imperialists any time and in any space according to the order of the WPK Central Committee if they encroach upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and make threatening provocations. He set forth the important tasks to be fulfilled to bolster up the nuclear force.

articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a reply message from Raul Castro Ruz, president of the Council of State of the Republic of Cuba, on Jan. 6.
					 The message said:
					
					 I, on behalf the Communist Party, government and people of Cuba, express thanks to you for sending warm congratulations on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of the victory of the Cuban revolution and reaffirm the will to continue strengthening friendly and cooperative relations and solidarity between our two countries.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Pakistani Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Pakistani Ambassador
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met with outgoing Pakistani Ambassador to the DPRK Syed Hasan Habib at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Visits Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Visits Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex. 
					 Going round various places of the complex, he said that workers of the complex should expand the successes achieved in making the production Juche-based and modern and increase the output of iron and steel in order to become an advanced group in making a breakthrough towards building an economic power.
					
					 The premier made a field survey of the remodeling Ryuwon Shoes Factory.
					
					 He underscored the need to update the factory at a high level and take thorough measures for the supply of raw and other materials to increase the production of shoes favored by the people.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Receives Credentials from WHO Representative
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Receives Credentials from WHO Representative
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, foreign minister of the DPRK, was presented with credentials by Thushara Fernando, representative of the WHO, on Wednesday.

articles.title: More Joint Army-Civilian Meetings Held in DPRK to Hail Successful H-bomb Test
articles.content:
More Joint Army-Civilian Meetings Held in DPRK to Hail Successful H-bomb Test
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Joint army-civilian meetings for hailing Juche Korea's first successful H-bomb test respectively took place in Ryanggang Province, cities and counties.
					 They were attended by officials of the local party and power bodies, working people's organizations, factories, enterprisers, farms and universities, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, working people, youths and students. 
					
					 The statement of the DPRK government was read out and congratulatory speeches were made at the meeting held in Ryanggang Province.
					
					 Speakers said that the success in the H-bomb test was a great deed of historic significance and victory that demonstrated the dignity of the great Paektusan nation far and wide. 
					
					 They stressed that the signal success made in the above-said test with indigenous wisdom, technology and efforts was the reflection of the highest tribute and loyalty to the great leaders and the manifestation of the unshakable faith and will of the Workers' Party of Korea dynamically advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 Speakers at the meetings held in the cities of Sunchon and Songrim and the counties of Taegwan, Unryul, Kyongsong, Chonma, Sangwon, Songwon and Jongphyong said the particularly significant event reinforced the will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to wage a more dynamic struggle for building a thriving nation with firm conviction that there is no formidable enemy to fear in the world and nothing is impossible.
					
					 They stressed the need to fully demonstrate the spirit and mettle of Songun Korea in ushering in a golden age of building a thriving nation this year when the Seventh Congress of the WPK is to be held.

articles.title: National Exhibition of Scientific and Technological Achievements of Youth and Students Opens
articles.content:
National Exhibition of Scientific and Technological Achievements of Youth and Students Opens
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition of scientific and technological achievements of youth and students opened with due ceremony at the Central Youth Hall Wednesday to mark the 70th anniversary of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					 Presented to the exhibition were hundreds of valuable inventions and new technological innovations greatly conducive to the development of the nation's science and technology.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Ri Il Hwan, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the youth league, officials concerned, young scientists, technicians, teachers, workers and three-revolution team members of the units which made presentations to the exhibition and youth and students in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Art Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
Art Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- An art exhibition was opened with due ceremony at the Central Youth Hall Wednesday to celebrate the 70th anniversary of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League. 
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were art works depicting the revolutionary lives and personalities of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 Art works depicting their images including oil painting "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung proclaiming the formation of the Democratic Youth League of North Korea" show the feats President Kim Il Sung started the revolutionary activities with youth movement and brought up the youth league to be powerful vanguard ranks guided by the original idea of attaching importance to the youth.
					
					 Acryl paintings "O Korea, I Will Add Glory to Thee" and "Single-minded Unity" show the personality of leader Kim Jong Il who led the young people to successfully carry out their mission and duty before the era and the revolution.
					
					 Displayed there are also those dealing with the young people who performed feats in annals of the revolution and the young vanguard creating the charging spirit and culture of young people of the Songun era.

articles.title: "Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes" Vol. 8 Published
articles.content:
"Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes" Vol. 8 Published
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Vol. 8 of "Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes", a cycle of revolutionary anecdotes, was published in the DPRK.
					 The four-chapter book contains revolutionary anecdotes telling about how President Kim Il Sung led the work to bring about more successes in the democratic reforms after Korea's liberation and further consolidate the people's power during the days from October, Juche 35 (1946) to June, Juche 36 (1947).
					
					 Chapter 29 "The first historic democratic election" includes the anecdotes dealing with the fact that the President led the work to successfully carry out the first democratic election after the liberation.
					
					 Chapter 30 "Birth of the first socialist government in Korea" contains the anecdotes "On his visit to Chongjin Railway Factory", "Teaching a key to recovering the revolving furnace on the spot", "Deafening cheers at the meeting place" and others.
					
					 Chapter 31 "For consolidating the people's power" deals with the fact that the President took warm care of the servicepersons as their parents would do and wisely led them to get appearance as befitting the regular army.
					
					 Chapter 32 "All efforts to fulfilling the first national economic plan!" includes the anecdote "On the day of his visit to Hwanghae Iron Works" and other anecdotes dealing with his leadership.

articles.title: Big Efforts Paid to Educational Science in DPRK
articles.content:
Big Efforts Paid to Educational Science in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The Academy of Pedagogical Science in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea strives to make fresh successes in its work for this year, in response to supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year address.
					 The General Education Institute set it as its target to improve the standard of the universal 12-year compulsory education.
					
					 The Higher and Normal Education Institute is concentrating efforts on the work to compile the world educational science dictionary and create database on world educational science.
					
					 Researchers of other related institutes work hard to further develop the educational work.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Academy has taken a series of measures to elevate the qualification of teachers.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Their "Unification Diplomacy"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Their "Unification Diplomacy"
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- In order to achieve national reunification at an early date it is necessary to reject interference by foreign forces and firmly adhere to the independent stand in the reunification issue.
					 Rodong Sinmun says this in an article Wednesday.
					
					 To inveigle outsiders into the issue of the internal affairs of the Korean nation would be little short of cooking one's own goose, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 National reunification is an independent cause to be achieved by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' dependence on foreign forces and cooperation with them are a treacherous act of escalating confrontation between the north and the south as they disturb independent reunification and sell the national interests.
					
					 Their "unification diplomacy" is a revelation of their sinister intention to deny the independent character of the national reunification and solve the issue of the reunification, the inner-Korean matter, by relying on outsiders.
					
					 The said "diplomacy" would only grant outsiders the pretext to meet their interests by interfering in the internal affairs of the Korean nation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' cooperation with foreign forces is quite contrary to the reunification programme common to the nation.
					
					 National independence is the core of the historic July 4 joint statement, June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration adopted by the north and the south.
					
					 When the south Korean authorities reject outsiders and pool efforts with the fellow countrymen from the stand of prioritizing the nation, the north-south relations would develop remarkably, but when they stand in confrontation with the fellow countrymen by attaching importance to foreign forces and making cooperation with them, the inter-Korean relations can hardly escape tension and catastrophe. This is the lesson taught by history and reality

articles.title: Repeal of "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Repeal of "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The June Democracy Forum, a south Korean civic organization, held a press conference before the Japanese embassy in Seoul on Jan. 11 in demand of the repeal of an "agreement" on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The organization disclosed that the negotiations for the sexual slavery between south Korea and Japan were a meeting behind closed doors which excluded the victims.
					
					 It said assailant Japan obliged to make a direct apology and reparation to the victims has taken an indifferent attitude after paying a paltry amount of money to south Korea.
					
					 It stressed that the recent "agreement" that glossed over the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army is null and void and must be repealed.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Warmongers Incite Confrontation with North
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Warmongers Incite Confrontation with North
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- South Korean military warmongers are desperately inciting confrontation with the north quite contrary to the desire of Koreans for defusing the danger of war and defending peace and security in the Korean Peninsula. 
					 The chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff of south Korea convened an emergency meeting of operation commanders on January 7 to give an instruction for "maintaining high alert" over "provocation" from the north and order his inferiors to stand in confrontation for "strong punishment". 
					
					 The defense minister appeared in the Missile Command known as control tower of Kill Chain, one of the preemptive strike system against the north, on January 9, to examine the posture of military counteraction and cry out for "prompt and accurate retaliation." 
					
					 On the same day the chief of Staff of the navy went busy inspecting Yonphyong Island, the advanced base 222 of the navy and the Second Fleet Command, stirring up war fever against the north. 
					
					 Timed to coincide with the above-said war hysteria, ground, naval and air units of the south Korean army staged madcap war drills under the simulated conditions of battles for occupying areas of the north, firing at random bullets and shells on the ground and in waters and air from near the forefront areas including the central and eastern sectors of the front and hottest spot in the West Sea of Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Police's Crackdown upon Leading Members of KCTU
articles.content:
S. Korean Police's Crackdown upon Leading Members of KCTU
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean fascist police arrested Pae Thae Son, chief of the room for organizing disputes of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU), on Jan. 11, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The Investigation Headquarters of the Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency took such action on the charge that he, together with Chairman of the KCTU Han Sang Gyun, agitated the "illegal violent demonstration" during the large-scale actions staged in Seoul spearheaded by the KCTU including the November 14 all-out people's rally. 
					
					 A warrant of arrest for Ri Yong Ju, general secretary of the KCTU, was issued.

articles.title: Foot-and-Mouth Disease Breaks out in S. Korea
articles.content:
Foot-and-Mouth Disease Breaks out in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Foot-and-mouth disease broke out at a farm in Kimje City, North Jolla Province of south Korea on Jan. 11, according to MBC of south Korea.
					 It was reported that hundreds of pigs infected with the disease have been culled.

articles.title: Work of Kim Jong Un Published in Germany
articles.content:
Work of Kim Jong Un Published in Germany 
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Young People, Be Vanguard Fighters Unfailingly Faithful to the Party's Revolutionary Cause of Songun" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house in Berlin. 
					 The work is a letter sent by Kim Jong Un to those attending the Fourth Conference of Primary Officials of the Youth League on September 18, Juche 103 (2014). 
					
					 It says that the Korean youths have covered glorious way by performing heroic feats and winning proud victory through many years of the revolution under the wise leadership and benevolent loving care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 It also clarifies the tasks for the Korean youths to successfully fulfill the role as young vanguard of the party in the present historic advance and ways for doing so.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on Jan. 6.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported by Bulgarian Figure
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported by Bulgarian Figure
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, issued a statement on January 2, supporting Marshal Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 Kim Jong Un proudly reviewed the last year and set forth the new year's tasks, Ivanov said, and went on:
					
					 I admire great successes achieved by the DPRK in the fields of economy and national defense last year.
					
					 These successes are the fruition of the correct line of the Workers' Party of Korea on attaching importance to science and its positive activities.
					
					 Kim Jong Un referred to the desire of the Korean nation for reunification, stressing that no one will or can bring the Korean nation reunification.
					
					 Clear is that reunification should be achieved by the Korean nation itself.
					
					 Foreign forces and the south Korean authorities obstruct Korea's reunification but the reunification will be surely achieved.
					
					 I sincerely wish the Korean people great successes in all fields of social and economic life and in the struggle for building the national defense and carrying out the cause of national reunification in this year when the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is to be held.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Praised by Mexican Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Praised by Mexican Figure
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, issued a statement on January 7, supporting Marshal Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 He said that Kim Jong Un's New Year Address serves as the great programme indicating the most correct and reasonable ways for building a thriving socialist nation, achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea and ensuring peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and Northeast Asia.
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address clarified detailed tasks and ways for bringing about a radical change in the economic development of the country and the improvement of the people's living standard and called for accomplishing the great cause of building a thriving nation on the principle of giving priority to self-development, he noted, adding:
					
					 The People's Socialist Party of Mexico extends full support to his New Year Address and wishes the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people successes in the efforts for building an economic power and accomplishing the independent and peaceful reunification of the country in the new year.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Supported by Indian and South African Political Figures
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported by Indian and South African Political Figures
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Political figures of India and South Africa issued statements supporting Marshal Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 A heavyweight of the Indian People's Party said on January 5:
					
					 The successes achieved by the Korean people last year is the fruition of the correct leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 We hope that the Korean people's efforts to replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty will come true and eternal peace settle in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 We also hope that the three principles of national reunification, June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration, which crystallize the general will of the nation, will be implemented with sincerity and Korea be reunified.
					
					 The first secretary of the Gauteng Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party said:
					
					 The party and government of the DPRK made crucible proposals for improving the north-south relations and accomplishing the reunification of the country and made sincere efforts for implementing them last year. But these did not bear fruition owing to the U.S. anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK and the south Korean authorities' policy of escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 We extend firm solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle to consolidate the capability for self-defense with the nuclear deterrent as its pivot, holding high the banner of Songun under the present situation in which high-handed and arbitrary practices are rampant and justice and truth are being trampled down.

articles.title: DPRK's H-bomb Test Hailed by Ecuadorian Bodies
articles.content:
DPRK's H-bomb Test Hailed by Ecuadorian Bodies 
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The DPRK succeeded in H-bomb test, demonstrating the might of the full-fledged nuclear weapons state and the dignity and mettle of the nation before the world.
					 The Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification and the Ecuador-Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People said this in a joint statement issued on January 8. 
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The DPRK's first H-bomb test was an exercise of the independent right of a sovereign state. 
					
					 Independence of the country and nation should be protected by its own efforts in the present world where all sorts of injustice and jungle law prevail owing to the highhanded and arbitrary practices of the U.S. 
					
					 The world progressive people hail the successful H-bomb test of the DPRK, fortress of justice, and are rejoiced over it as their own. 
					
					 We wish the Korean people bigger successes in the building of a thriving socialist nation and the drive for independent and peaceful reunification of the country with the pride of being the people of a nuclear weapons state with H-bomb.

articles.title: Brazilian Ambassador Calls for Conclusion of Peace Treaty between DPRK and U. S.
articles.content:
Brazilian Ambassador Calls for Conclusion of Peace Treaty between DPRK and U.S.
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Roberto Colin, Brazilian ambassador to the DPRK, called for the conclusion of a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S. 
					 According to Ria-Novosti of Russia on Jan. 10, the ambassador in an interview with a news agency said that the nuclear issue cannot be settled only by accusations and sanctions against the DPRK. The issue can be settled through dialogue and diplomacy, he noted, adding it is almost impossible to expect a change under the present situation in which the Armistice Agreement signed in 1953 has not been replaced by a peace treaty.
					
					 The DPRK is set to show that the U.S. will have to pay an increasing amount of price for refusing dialogue with the DPRK, he said, noting how the DPRK will act in the future depends on the U.S. attitude.
					
					 Conveying this, the news agency said that the DPRK is calling for putting an end to the present situation in the Korean Peninsula which is neither war nor peace from long ago. But the U.S., which is deploying lots of troops in south Korea under the pretext of the "threat from the north", is refusing to discuss the issue of concluding a peace treaty with the DPRK, it said, adding herein lies the one of the reasons that the DPRK is bolstering nuclear deterrence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un participa en ceremonia de condecoracion a contribuyentes a prueba de bomba H
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con embajador pakistani
Pyongyang, 13 de enero (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, departio hoy en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con Syed Hasan Habib, embajador de la Republica Islamica de Pakistan en la RPDC, quien le hizo una visita de despedida.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con embajador Pakistani
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae
Pyongyang, 13 de enero (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, se cercioro en el terreno de las gestiones del Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae.
					  Despues de recorrer varios lugares del complejo, convoco una reunion de consulta, en que subrayo que los obreros de dicho complejo deben ampliar mas exitos de la jucheanizacion y la modernizacion y producir mucho los materiales de hierro y acero siendo soldados de patrulla que abren la brecha de la construccion de una potencia economica.
					
					  Ademas, Pak se entero en el terreno del estado de la reconstruccion de la Fabrica de Calzados Ryuwon.
					
					  Recorriendo varios lugares de la fabrica destaco la necesidad de realizar en alto nivel la modernizacion de la fabrica, tomar las medidas estrictas para asegurar las materias primas y materiales y producir mucho los articulos que gozan de buena reputacion por parte del pueblo.

articles.title: Continuan mitines conjuntos para felicitar exitosa prueba de bomba H
articles.content:
Continuan mitines conjuntos para felicitar exitosa prueba de bomba H
Pyongyang, 13 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar en la provincia de Ryanggang, ciudades y distritos los mitines conjuntos del ejercito y el pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea para felicitar el exito de la primera prueba de bomba H de la Corea de Juche.
					Participaron alli los funcionarios de los organismos locales del partido y el Poder, entidades de masas, fabricas, empresas, granjas y planteles docentes, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes de las respectivas localidades.
					
					En el mitin conjunto realizado en la provincia de Ryanggang se dio lectura a la declaracion del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y hubo discursos de felicitacion.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que la primera prueba de bomba H de la RPDC fue un evento historico y un triunfo que demostraron a todo el mundo la dignidad y el impetu de la potencia del monte Paektu.
					
					La victoria fulminante, alcanzada con nuestra inteligencia, tecnologia tipica y fuerzas propias, es el maximo homenaje y fidelidad, dedicados a los grandes Lideres, subrayaron y enfatizaron que es una expresion de la conviccion y la voluntad inconmovibles del Partido del Trabajo de Corea que marcha sin vacilacion alguna por la senda de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo.
					
					En los mitines conjuntos, efectuados en las ciudades de Sunchon y Songrim y los distritos de Taegwan, Unryul, Kyongsong, Chonma, Sangwon, Songwon y Jongphyong, los oradores senalaron que a traves del evento de hoy, el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos redoblaron el coraje de que no hay en el mundo ningun enemigo que puede vencerles ni nada inalcanzable, y pueden concentrar las fuerzas en la gran causa de construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					Recalcaron que demostraran el coraje y la tempestad de la Corea de Songun en la lucha por abrir la epoca de esplendor de la construccion de un Estado prospero el presente ano en que se convocara la VII Conferencia del PTC.

articles.title: Inaugurada exposicion de exitos cientifico-tecnicos de jovenes y estudiantes
articles.content:
Inaugurada exposicion de exitos cientifico-tecnicos de jovenes y estudiantes
Pyongyang, 13 de enero (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada la exposicion de exitos cientifico-tecnicos de jovenes y estudiantes dedicada al 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung.
					Se presentaron en la ocasion centenares de inventos y proyectos de innovacion de nuevas tecnicas contribuidos al desarrollo de ciencias y tecnicas del pais incluyendo decenas de productos tecnicos sofisticados completados por los jovenes y estudiantes de todas las localidades.
					
					La ceremonia de su inauguracion tuvo lugar hoy en la Casa Central de la Juventud.
					
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion Ri Il Hwan, jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los funcionarios de la UJS y de las ramas correspondientes, cientificos juveniles, tecnicos, profesores, obreros y miembros de grupos de tres revoluciones de las unidades exponentes, jovenes y estudiantes en esta capital.
